channel.title: Quick Question: HD Version of the Teaser Trailer?
channel.description: Where can I find a 720p version of the BM teaser? Cant seem to find one on YouTube and Monkey Junkie's website isnt up.

item.title: Quick Question: HD Version of the Teaser Trailer?
item.dc:creator: BarneyCalhoun
item.description:
The_Assassin47:

Where can I find a 720p version of the BM teaser? Cant seem to find one on YouTube and Monkie Junkie’s website isnt up.

https://blackmesasource.com/

Right there on the main page is the 720p version.

Edit: Also available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G32_q_3es8E&feature=player_embedded#at=65
